name: Imputed amounts for total and federally financed higher education R&D expenditures, by type of R&D: FY 2019
description: Imputed amounts for total and federally financed higher education R&D expenditures, by type of R&D: FY 2019

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_total_imputed_amount_as_of_total
variableMeasured.description: Total Imputed Amount As Of Total

variableMeasured.name: field_federally_financed_all_r_d_expenditures
variableMeasured.description: Federally Financed All R D Expenditures

variableMeasured.name: field_federally_financed_imputed_amount_as_of_total
variableMeasured.description: Federally Financed Imputed Amount As Of Total

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Imputation rate at total level is lower than imputation rates at detail levels because some institutions could provide totals but not details. Because of rounding, detail may not add to total. Percentages calculated on unrounded numbers. This table includes only institutions reporting $1 million or more in total R&D expenditures in FY 2018. Institutions reporting less than $1 million in total R&D expenditures in FY 2018 completed a shorter version of the survey form in FY 2019 that did not include this question.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Higher Education Research and Development Survey, FY 2019.
